Galaxy¶

class misfit.Galaxy(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: misfit.GalaxyBasic

Galaxy class to contain information about spectra for MISFIT. Usage:

gal = Galaxy(z=z, n=n, ....) spec1D = ObsSpectrum1D(wave=wave_arr, flux=flux_arr,

flux_err=flux_err_arr, spec_mask=mask_arr, units_wave=’angstroms’, units_flux=’flam’, extraction_method=’optimal’ or ‘boxcar’, band=’H’)

gal.set_spectrum_1D(spec1D)

Methods Summary

calculate_slit_object_delta_PA() Calculate misalignment of galaxy within slit: store in galaxy
set_pstamp(pstamp)
set_spectrum_1D(obsSpectrum1D)
set_spectrum_2D(obsSpectrum2D)
